welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Amityville, where the charm of our quaint town is waiting to embrace you. From our historic landmarks to the beautiful beaches, we invite you to explore and discover all that Amityville has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves as the central hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more personalized and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Currently under construction, will handle domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: One of the largest terminals, handles international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Handles international flights for British Airways and other Oneworld alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves as the main terminal for domestic flights for airlines like JetBlue, United, and Spirit.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Primarily used by Delta for domestic and international flights, with a few other airlines also operating here.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Dedicated to Delta's domestic and international flights, with a few flights from WestJet as well.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free for up to 30 minutes, with an option to purchase additional time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport is a modern and spacious facility, offering a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling on private jets, the private terminal at Brookhaven Airport offers luxury amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
